product_description: Large format panels made of glassfibre reinforced concrete

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems

transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: electric forklifts and pool cars, electric cars for sales people
minimisation_design_strategy: When creating the facade plan, individual geometries should be optimized based on the standard sizes of the panels (2500/3100/3600 x 1310 mm) in order to minimise waste.
factory_finished_description:
Rieder facade cladding is designed as a mounted, ventilated facade in accordance with DIN 18516-1. This construction method, which distinguishes between thermal insulation and weather protection, is not only advantageous from the point of view of building physics, but also allows the creation of a variety of effects with different types of cladding. Attention must be paid to correct rear ventilation.

Visible: rivets, screws

Concealed: bonding, undercut anchor, Rieder Power Anchor
type_of_packaging:
Where it is technically possible and makes ecological sense, there will be a gradual reduction of plastic packaging, some of which will be replaced by cardboard
packaging.

product_description: Vivid facade slats made of glassfibre reinforced concrete

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems

transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: electric forklifts and pool cars, electric cars for sales people
minimisation_design_strategy: When creating the facade plan, individual geometries should be optimized based on the standard sizes of the panels (2500/3100/3600 x 1310 mm) in order to minimise waste.
factory_finished_description: The further refined invisible fastening system hidden fix for öko skin facade slats with the format 147 x 1800 mm enables quick and easy installation. With the concealed attachment, the öko skin slats are even more effective, since the overall appearance is not marred by rivets or screws. Rieder supplies all fastening components as well as the öko skin slats. The slats can also be mounted with rivets, screws (on a wooden substructure), undercut anchors, the Rieder Power Anchor, or adhesive.
type_of_packaging:
Where it is technically possible and makes ecological sense, there will be a gradual reduction of plastic packaging, some of which will be replaced by cardboard
packaging.

product_description: 3D shaped concrete elements

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems

minimisation_design_strategy: When creating the facade plan, individual geometries should be optimized based on the standard sizes of the panels (2500/3100/3600 x 1310 mm) in order to minimise waste.
factory_finished_description: The shaped concrete elements are available as L or U cross-sections, round arches, and special shapes with a length of up to five meters. plug & play - The jointed formed parts are connected using different mounting brackets depending on size. As a system supplier, Rieder provides coordinated components, resulting in an integrated solution from a single source. The simple anchorage system allows on-site adjustment, high fitting accuracy and concealed mounting. The mounting options are compatible with all standard supporting structures and are a time-saving, economical and sustainable alternative. For the mounting of formparts. Rieder offers a library of standard details with typical vertical and horizontal sections as well as details for fire barriers, connections for glass facades, shutter boxes, ceiling cladding, roof connections and column cladding. Based on project experience, a large collection of prepared special solutions for mounting on a wide variety of building and facade types is also available.
type_of_packaging:
Where it is technically possible and makes ecological sense, there will be a gradual reduction of plastic packaging, some of which will be replaced by cardboard
packaging.

recycling_process_description: Ceramic can be used as filling material for road construction, for example.
water_reduction_techniques: Our material production process reincorporate 100% of the water used in the process, ensuring zero discharge. All the links in the production chain are designed to facilitate the recycling of materials.
minimisation_design_strategy: This product is manufactured to required widths and lengths and largest individual tile available is 0.90m2 This ensures minimal wastage.
modern_slavery_comments:
The supply chain is within Spain. Spain has deposited its instrument of ratification of the Protocol of 2014 to the Forced Labour Convention, 1930, 
thereby becoming the 19th country worldwide and the 13th in Europe to ratify the Protocol.
installation_risks_description: Dust. ONLY during MODIFICATION (if not correct tools -wet cut- are used). TEMPIO provides safety sheets if they are needed.
factory_finished_description: As a prominent producer of premium ceramic materials for outdoor construction solutions, we specialize in the manufacturing and rehabilitation of ventilated facades. Our diverse product portfolio is meticulously crafted to meet and exceed consumer expectations in design, quality, and safety. We take pride in fostering a work environment that inspires and encourages peak performance. Committed to fostering a work environment where inspiration thrives, we pride ourselves on being an efficient, organized, and environmentally conscious company.

recycling_process_description: Our ceramic tiles can be re-used once they are demount.
reusable_description: All our baguettes anchoring systems are mechanical and they can be demount.
water_reduction_techniques: Our material porduction process reincorporate 100% of the water used in the process, ensuring zero discharge. All the links in the production chain are designed to facilitate the recycling of materials.
minimisation_design_strategy: This product is manufactured to required widths and lengths to ensure minimal wastage.
modern_slavery_comments:
The PROTOCOL OF 2014 TO THE FORCED LABOUR CONVENTION was trasposed to SPANISH normative by:
BOE-A-2017-15189 Instrumento de ratificación del Protocolo de 2014 relativo al Convenio sobre el trabajo forzoso, 1930, hecho en Ginebra el 11 de junio de 2014.
installation_risks_description: Dust. ONLY during MODIFICATION (if not correct tools -wet cut- are used). TEMPIO provides safety sheets if they are needed.
factory_finished_description:
Technical and aesthetic advantages

Our terracotta facades offer numerous technical and aesthetic advantages for your facade:

Durable Colours: Terracotta colours and glazes remain unalterable over time.
Self-cleaning: They are automatically cleaned by rain, reducing the need for maintenance.
Durable Resistance: Designed to resist wear and tear over the years.
Energy Saving: Reduce energy costs by 25 to 40% and enjoy greater thermal and acoustic comfort.
Waterproofing: Keep your building watertight thanks to our screens.
Passive Ventilation: Encourage passive ventilation for a healthier and more energy efficient environment.
Thermal Insulation: Contributes to thermal insulation and indoor comfort.
Easy Replacement: Our system allows for piece-by-piece replacement, making repairs easier.
Value for your Property: Add value to your property with these high quality solar screens.
type_of_packaging: Wooden pallet and card board.

product_description: Sustainability without maintenance

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems

recycling_process_description: Yes, it can be deconstructued. Our RUSTIKOTTA tiles are mechanically anchored and can be used again.
reusable_description: Yes, our RUSTIKOTTA tiles are designed to be mechanically anchored.
water_reduction_techniques: Our material proudction process reincorporate 100%of the water used in the process, ensuring zero discharge. All the links in the prodcution chain are designed to facilitate the recycling of materials.
minimisation_design_strategy: This product is manufactured to required widths and lengths to ensure minimal wastage.
modern_slavery_comments:
The supply chain is within Spain. Spain has deposited its instrument of ratification of the Protocol of 2014 to the Forced Labour Convention, 1930, 
thereby becoming the 19th country worldwide and the 13th in Europe to ratify the Protocol.
installation_risks_description: Dust. ONLY during MODIFICATION (if not corret tools - wet cut- are used). TEMPIO providees safety sheets if they are needed.
factory_finished_description:
Sustainability without maintenance
Rustikotta makes a significant and positive contribution to sustainable development and sustainable construction. It brings pioneering new standards for architectural opportunities, to which can be added its zero maintenance cost over the years, as external conditions do not affect the ceramic piece and rainwater is sufficient to keep it clean.

It is an investment. Rustikotta is a safe and high quality option, it will give you a lot of opportunities. Use your imagination and add your own personal and individual touch.

Present, past and future
More and more architects and designers are opting to use this material for their facades, which is not only aesthetically pleasing, it offers freedom. The freedom to create new, exciting and unique buildings, or to renovate them, which can also be enjoyed by future generations, because façades made with Rustikotta are a sustainable investment from an environmental, social and economic point of view.

Using the best materials and the most advanced ceramic technology, this product is resistant to extreme temperatures, waterproof and easy to install, as well as creating an exceptional visual effect.
type_of_packaging: Wooden pallet, strips and cardboard.

factory_finished_description:
Discover the stunning beauty and unparalleled versatility of Listelo skin, an innovative proposal that combines modernity and naturalness to completely transform your buildings and facades. With a wide variety of elegant shapes, Listelo skin is the perfect covering for avant-garde yet traditional designs, giving façades a unique and captivating look.

Its versatility is its greatest virtue, allowing you to play with contrasts and harmonies, allowing you to achieve a cohesive and attractive aesthetic that never goes unnoticed. Listelo skin coverings stand out in both residential and commercial buildings, giving them a distinctive and elegant touch.

In addition, Listelo skin’s durability and ease of maintenance ensure that your investment lasts over time without losing its splendour. These coatings have been designed to withstand the elements and maintain their impeccable appearance over the years.

certifications.certification: Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification

recyclable_percentage_description: Any timber machinist in Australia is able to re-machine into new products.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Our timber offcuts can be used for even the smallest of items such as gold tee's to avoid sending offcuts to landfill.
recycled_content_description: Our timber fibers are UPCYCLED from low-value resources and we have a yield of more than double that of traditional timber.
recycling_process_description: Our timbers can be re-machined into endless possible applications. Any timber machinist in Australia is able to re-machine into new products.
reusable_description: Our timbers can be re-machined into endless possible applications
end_of_life_program_description: Our timbers are suitable for use by the recycled timber industry or any other person looking for recycled materials.
water_reduction_techniques: No
minimisation_design_strategy: Our billets can be machined into many different items. We encourage engagement with our personnel as we desire to find solutions to minimise offcuts or wastage by looking across multiple applications.

detailed_certifications.certification: Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification

applied_finish_required_description: Standard timber finishes and stains are suitable for timbers. We recommend following coating guidelines and maintenance for specific applications are followed to ensure longevity of timbers.
type_of_packaging: We use a recyclable plastic wrap to protect our raw timbers from moisture during transport.

The packaging is placed on roller conveyors, through which it is hooded by applying a suitable cap and then conveyed to the oven for the application of shrink film.

recyclable_percentage_description: Available through third party recycling facilities
recyclable_offcuts_description: They can be crushed and used as concrete aggregates or road construction.
recycling_process_description: After demolition and deconstruction, ceramic tiles can be crushed and used in a wide range of different applications, such as concrete aggregates or road construction.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes - there are no water discharges resulting from the manufacturing process of the products since the water used in plant washing and squaring processes is totally recycled internally in the process, both in the preparation phase of the mixture and for the production of atomized, and only to a small extent delivered externally for recovery to authorized parties, in the form of ceramic sludge and unpurified water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: The mineral raw materials used (clay, sand, feldspar) come directly from their places of origin (quarries or production sites) and arrive via ship and road transport. No extra detours are taken.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts or wastage, it is recommended to consider the layout, design and size of the tile
modern_slavery_comments: Italcer Group guarantees the protection of human rights throughout the value chain.
installation_risks_description: Silica is a naturally occurring mineral found in many types of rock and soil, and therefore  is found in many construction materials including tiles.  Please contact us for more information.

product_description: Building Integrated Photovoltaic Solutions by OnyxSolar

product_categories.category_name: External Wall Claddings and Facades and systems
Glass and glazing

recyclable_percentage_description:
Recycling Glass, 98% 
recovered & recycled Silicon, 95% 
Copper, 33% 
Other metals, 95%
end_of_life_program_description: Module C1, starts when the product is replaced or dismantled and has no additional functionality. It includes on-site disassembly and sorting operations. The solar photovoltaic glass is manually disassembled from the building and transported (module C2) for recycling, assuming 550 km as the transport distance (UNE EN 17074:2020). Module C3 includes the collection of waste fractions, as well as the treatment of material flows that are to be recycled or subject to energy recovery, and finally final disposal in landfill (module C4), quantified at 15% (Directive 2012/19/EU).
minimisation_design_strategy: The product is customized to suit the application, hence no wastage.
factory_finished_description: OnyxSolar Photovoltaic Glass products are customized to suit the requirements of each project and are supplied ready to be installed without further finishing needed.
type_of_packaging: Wood box and wooden dividers
